EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear (Customer first name),
Thank you for your interest in SunPower and congratulations on taking the first step towards going solar!
What’s next? I have taken the opportunity to outline the next steps below;
I have passed your details onto your local SunPower Authorised Partner (distributor/installer).
They will now contact you via phone or email and;
· Answer all your solar questions
· Complete a detailed home solar assessment
· Calculate the potential saving you can make by installing SunPower
· Provide you with a quote for installing a SunPower solar system
Your local SunPower Authorised Partner is: “Partner Name”
You should expect to be contacted by this Partner within the next 24-hours. Should you wish to contact them, you can do so by calling [Partner phone #].
If you have any questions and would like to contact us, please feel free to call our toll free number: 1800 786 769.
Regards,
CSR Name | Customer Service Representative - Australia
office 800-786-769 | customerservice.australia@sunpower.com
